pinyin: kai1 gong1 mei2 you3 hui2 tou2 jian4

definitions.kai1 gong1 mei2 you3 hui2 tou2 jian4: lit. once you've shot the arrow, there's no getting it back (idiom); fig. once you started sth, there's no turning back; to have to finish what one started; to be determined to reach one's goals in spite of setbacks;
